Introduction

The objectives of this lab are to:

  • Practice writing loops using some common patterns
  • Learn how to read an undetermined amount of input with a Scanner
  • Learn how to use the debugger for tracing through loops
  • Learn how to break into an infinite loop and how to break at exceptions before they happen

Your first step is to create a new project in your workspace named project6. Inside that project, create a package lab6.
